entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -22.8°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this morning then sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
